type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.component.ProjectComponentIdentifier
type.description: * An identifier for a component instance that is built as part of the current build. * * @since 1.10

method.name: getProjectPath
method.description: * Returns the path of the project which the component belongs to. * * @since 1.10

property.name: projectPath
property.description: * Returns the path of the project which the component belongs to. * * @since 1.10
